label: uncl9641
comment: Code qualifying the basis on which a service is performed.

values.label: Condition
values.comment: The service was performed based on a condition.

values.label: Occurrence
values.comment: The service was performed based on an occurrence.

values.label: Occurrence span
values.comment: The service was performed based on an event occurring over a period of time.

values.label: Procedure
values.comment: The service was performed based on a procedure.

values.label: Value code
values.comment: The service was performed based on a value code.
